comments.author: Khisanth.2948
comments.body: The “Cannot assign requested address.” seems a bit odd. Do you have more than `ulimit -n` descriptors opened?

comments.author: Stefan Larimore.6872
comments.body: Is this a regression you are seeing or a new machine you are querying from? I assume the latter. Perhaps the machine you are querying from doesn’t have some standard root certificates installed. Ensure the GeoTrust Global CA cert in installed on your machine.
